Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Dacarbazine is approved to be used alone or with other drugs to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Hodgkin lymphoma in patients whose disease has not gotten better with other chemotherapy.
Melanoma that has metastasized (spread to other parts of the body).

Section.Para: Dacarbazine is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
